```{r}

# ============================================================
# FIG 1 — FULL SCRIPT (ROBUST to invalid geometries)
# - fixes TopologyException by validating/repairing geometries
# - stripes clipped inside VIC only (fails gracefully)
# - auto extent from plotted layers (no forced xmin)
# ============================================================

stopifnot(requireNamespace("sf", quietly = TRUE))
stopifnot(requireNamespace("raster", quietly = TRUE))
use_ragg <- requireNamespace("ragg", quietly = TRUE)

# ----------------------------
# 0) SAFE GEOMETRY HELPERS
# ----------------------------
safe_make_valid <- function(x) {
  if (!inherits(x, "sf")) return(x)
  if (nrow(x) == 0) return(x)

  # Drop empty geometries early
  g <- sf::st_geometry(x)
  keep <- !sf::st_is_empty(g)
  if (!any(keep)) return(x[0, ])

  x <- x[keep, , drop = FALSE]

  # Make valid (prefer lwgeom, fallback to buffer(0))
  if (requireNamespace("lwgeom", quietly = TRUE)) {
    x <- suppressWarnings(lwgeom::st_make_valid(x))
  } else {
    # buffer(0) often fixes self-intersections for polygons
    x <- suppressWarnings(sf::st_buffer(x, 0))
  }

  # Sometimes geometry collections appear
  gt <- as.character(sf::st_geometry_type(x))
  if (any(gt == "GEOMETRYCOLLECTION")) {
    x <- suppressWarnings(sf::st_collection_extract(x, "POLYGON"))
    if (nrow(x) == 0) return(x)
  }

  x
}

safe_union_geom <- function(sfc_or_sf) {
  # robust union: if union fails, fallback to st_combine()
  g <- if (inherits(sfc_or_sf, "sf")) sf::st_geometry(sfc_or_sf) else sfc_or_sf
  g <- g[!sf::st_is_empty(g)]
  if (length(g) == 0) return(NULL)
  out <- try(suppressWarnings(sf::st_union(g)), silent = TRUE)
  if (inherits(out, "try-error")) out <- suppressWarnings(sf::st_combine(g))
  out
}

safe_bbox_from_sf <- function(sfobj) {
  if (!inherits(sfobj, "sf") || nrow(sfobj) == 0) return(NULL)
  g <- sf::st_geometry(sfobj)
  g <- g[!sf::st_is_empty(g)]
  if (length(g) == 0) return(NULL)
  bb <- suppressWarnings(sf::st_bbox(g))
  bb
}

# Diagonal stripe generator + clip (fails gracefully)
make_stripes_clipped <- function(poly_sf, spacing_frac = 0.07, angle_deg = 45) {
  if (!inherits(poly_sf, "sf") || nrow(poly_sf) == 0) return(NULL)

  # validate poly
  poly_sf <- safe_make_valid(poly_sf)
  if (nrow(poly_sf) == 0) return(NULL)

  poly_u <- safe_union_geom(poly_sf)
  if (is.null(poly_u)) return(NULL)

  bb <- sf::st_bbox(poly_u)
  xr <- as.numeric(bb["xmax"] - bb["xmin"])
  yr <- as.numeric(bb["ymax"] - bb["ymin"])
  if (!is.finite(xr) || !is.finite(yr) || xr <= 0 || yr <= 0) return(NULL)

  pad <- 0.08
  xmin <- as.numeric(bb["xmin"] - pad * xr)
  xmax <- as.numeric(bb["xmax"] + pad * xr)
  ymin <- as.numeric(bb["ymin"] - pad * yr)
  ymax <- as.numeric(bb["ymax"] + pad * yr)

  # number of lines driven by diagonal length
  diag <- sqrt(xr^2 + yr^2)
  step <- spacing_frac * diag
  n_lines <- max(18, ceiling((xmax - xmin) / step))
  xs <- seq(xmin, xmax, length.out = n_lines)

  crs_use <- sf::st_crs(poly_sf)

  lines <- lapply(xs, function(x0) sf::st_linestring(rbind(c(x0, ymin), c(x0, ymax))))
  grid_lines <- sf::st_sfc(lines, crs = crs_use)

  # rotate around bbox center
  cx <- (xmin + xmax) / 2
  cy <- (ymin + ymax) / 2
  th <- angle_deg * pi / 180
  R <- matrix(c(cos(th), -sin(th), sin(th), cos(th)), 2, 2, byrow = TRUE)

  rot_one <- function(ls) {
    xy <- sf::st_coordinates(ls)[,1:2, drop = FALSE]
    xy2 <- t(R %*% t(xy - c(cx, cy)) + c(cx, cy))
    sf::st_linestring(xy2)
  }
  grid_rot <- sf::st_sfc(lapply(grid_lines, rot_one), crs = crs_use)

  # clip stripes to polygon
  stripes_sf <- sf::st_sf(geom = grid_rot)
  poly_sf_u  <- sf::st_sf(geom = poly_u)

  clipped <- try(suppressWarnings(sf::st_intersection(stripes_sf, poly_sf_u)), silent = TRUE)
  if (inherits(clipped, "try-error") || !nrow(clipped)) return(NULL)

  # keep line types only
  gtypes <- as.character(sf::st_geometry_type(clipped))
  clipped <- clipped[gtypes %in% c("LINESTRING", "MULTILINESTRING"), , drop = FALSE]
  if (!nrow(clipped)) return(NULL)

  clipped
}

lwd_box   <- 1.2
lwd_arrow <- 0.85

pch_site        <- 21
col_site_border <- "black"
pt_lwd_site     <- 1.2
cex_pts         <- 1.85

CEX_BOLD       <- 1.05
cex_axis       <- 1.20
cex_site_lab   <- 1.25
cex_key        <- 1.10
cex_axis_title <- 0.80

stripe_col <- adjustcolor("grey20", alpha.f = 0.55)
stripe_lwd <- 1.0

# ----------------------------
# 5) TEXT/LEGEND HELPERS
# ----------------------------
halo_text <- function(x, y, labels, cex = 1, font = 2,
                      col = "black", halo_col = "white", halo_mult = 0.75, ...) {
  offs <- halo_mult * strwidth("M", cex = cex) / 10
  for (dx in c(-offs, 0, offs)) for (dy in c(-offs, 0, offs)) {
    if (dx != 0 || dy != 0)
      text(x + dx, y + dy, labels, cex = cex, font = font, col = halo_col, ...)
  }
  text(x, y, labels, cex = cex, font = font, col = col, ...)
}

label_in_panel <- function(txt, cex = CEX_BOLD){
  usr <- par("usr")
  x <- usr[1] + 0.04 * (usr[2] - usr[1])
  y <- usr[4] - 0.06 * (usr[4] - usr[3])
  w <- strwidth(txt, cex = cex, font = 2)
  h <- strheight("Mg", cex = cex, font = 2)
  rect(x - 0.35*w, y - 0.55*h, x + w + 0.35*w, y + 0.25*h,
       col = adjustcolor("white", alpha.f = 0.90), border = NA)
  text(x, y, txt, adj = c(0,1), cex = cex, font = 2)
}

callout <- function(x, y, label, dx = 0.25, dy = 0.12, cex = 0.98){
  usr <- par("usr")
  tx <- x + dx * (usr[2] - usr[1])
  ty <- y + dy * (usr[4] - usr[3])
  tx <- min(max(tx, usr[1] + 0.06*(usr[2]-usr[1])), usr[2] - 0.06*(usr[2]-usr[1]))
  ty <- min(max(ty, usr[3] + 0.06*(usr[4]-usr[3])), usr[4] - 0.06*(usr[4]-usr[3]))
  arrows(tx, ty, x, y, length = 0.06, lwd = 1.0, col = "black")
  halo_text(tx, ty, label, cex = cex, font = 2, col = "black")
}

draw_key_panel <- function(){
  par(xpd = NA)
  plot.new()
  box(col = "grey60", lwd = 0.9)

  usr <- par("usr")
  text(usr[1] + 0.06*(usr[2]-usr[1]), usr[4] - 0.08*(usr[4]-usr[3]),
       "Key", adj = c(0,1), font = 2, cex = CEX_BOLD)

  legend("topleft", bty = "n", cex = cex_key,
         inset = c(0.06, 0.14),
         title = "Impervious areas",
         text.font = 1, title.font = 2,
         pch = 15, col = c(col_conn, col_unconn),
         legend = c("Connected", "Unconnected"))

  # NOTE: base legend() cannot set point border independently per entry.
  legend("topleft", bty = "n", cex = cex_key,
         inset = c(0.06, 0.46),
         title = "Catchments",
         text.font = 1, title.font = 2,
         legend = catch_levels,
         lty = rep(catch_lty, 3),
         lwd = rep(catch_lwd, 3),
         col = unname(catch_cols[catch_levels]),
         pch = rep(pch_site, 3),
         pt.bg = unname(catch_cols[catch_levels]),
         pt.cex = 1.30,
         pt.lwd = pt_lwd_site)

  legend("topleft", bty = "n", cex = cex_key,
         inset = c(0.06, 0.76),
         legend = "Streams",
         lty = lty_stream, lwd = lwd_stream, col = col_stream)
}

draw_inset_australia <- function(){
  aus_u <- safe_union_geom(aus_ll)
  plot(aus_u, col = "grey92", border = "grey40",
       axes = FALSE, xlab = "", ylab = "", asp = 1)

  # Victoria shaded + clipped stripes (inside VIC only)
  plot(sf::st_geometry(vic_ll), add = TRUE,
       col = adjustcolor("grey30", alpha.f = 0.12),
       border = "grey20", lwd = 0.9)

  stripes <- make_stripes_clipped(vic_ll, spacing_frac = 0.070, angle_deg = 45)
  if (!is.null(stripes)) {
    plot(sf::st_geometry(stripes), add = TRUE, col = stripe_col, lwd = stripe_lwd)
    plot(sf::st_geometry(vic_ll), add = TRUE, col = NA, border = "grey20", lwd = 0.9)
  }

  box(col = "grey60", lwd = 0.9)
  label_in_panel("Australia", cex = CEX_BOLD)
}

draw_inset_victoria <- function(){
  plot(sf::st_geometry(vic_ll),
       col = adjustcolor("grey30", alpha.f = 0.10),
       border = "grey40",
       axes = FALSE, xlab = "", ylab = "", asp = 1)

  stripes <- make_stripes_clipped(vic_ll, spacing_frac = 0.085, angle_deg = 45)
  if (!is.null(stripes)) {
    plot(sf::st_geometry(stripes), add = TRUE, col = stripe_col, lwd = stripe_lwd)
    plot(sf::st_geometry(vic_ll), add = TRUE, col = NA, border = "grey40", lwd = 1.0)
  }

  ctr_xy  <- sf::st_coordinates(cats_ctr_ll)[1,]
  melb_xy <- sf::st_coordinates(melb_ll)[1,]

  points(ctr_xy[1],  ctr_xy[2],  pch = 21, bg = "red",    col = "black", cex = 1.12)
  points(melb_xy[1], melb_xy[2], pch = 21, bg = "yellow", col = "black", cex = 1.18)

  callout(melb_xy[1], melb_xy[2], "Melbourne",        dx = -0.26, dy =  0.10, cex = 0.98)
  callout(ctr_xy[1],  ctr_xy[2],  "Study catchments", dx =  0.18, dy = -0.14, cex = 0.98)

  box(col = "grey60", lwd = 0.9)
  label_in_panel("Victoria", cex = CEX_BOLD)
}

# ----------------------------
# 6) LAYOUT
# ----------------------------
layout(matrix(c(1,2,
                1,3,
                1,4),
              nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE),
       widths  = c(1.00, 0.40),
       heights = c(1,1,1))

# ----------------------------
# 7) MAIN EXTENT = bbox of layers we draw (after repair)
# ----------------------------
catIA_2009 <- catIA[
  is.na(catIA$constructionDate) |
    (!is.na(catIA$constructionDate) & catIA$constructionDate < "2009-10-01"),
]
catIA_2009 <- safe_make_valid(catIA_2009)

bbs <- list(
  safe_bbox_from_sf(catMap11_f),
  safe_bbox_from_sf(streams_v),
  safe_bbox_from_sf(siteMap11_f),
  safe_bbox_from_sf(catIA_2009)
)
bbs <- bbs[!vapply(bbs, is.null, logical(1))]
if (!length(bbs)) stop("Could not compute extent: all bboxes were NULL.")

xmin <- min(vapply(bbs, function(b) as.numeric(b["xmin"]), numeric(1)))
xmax <- max(vapply(bbs, function(b) as.numeric(b["xmax"]), numeric(1)))
ymin <- min(vapply(bbs, function(b) as.numeric(b["ymin"]), numeric(1)))
ymax <- max(vapply(bbs, function(b) as.numeric(b["ymax"]), numeric(1)))

w <- xmax - xmin
h <- ymax - ymin
pad_x <- 0.03 * w
pad_y <- 0.06 * h

xlim_pad <- c(xmin - pad_x, xmax + pad_x)
ylim_pad <- c(ymin - pad_y, ymax + pad_y)

# ----------------------------
# 8) DRAW MAIN MAP
# ----------------------------
par(mar = c(5.2, 7.4, 0.9, 0.6),
    mgp = c(2.7, 0.9, 0),
    xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i", las = 1)

plot(sf::st_geometry(catMap11_f),
     xlim = xlim_pad, ylim = ylim_pad,
     col = NA, border = NA, axes = FALSE)

# IA fill (robust to NA conn)
if (inherits(catIA_2009, "sf") && nrow(catIA_2009) > 0) {
  conn_vals <- catIA_2009$conn
  conn_vals[is.na(conn_vals)] <- 0
  idx <- match(conn_vals, c(1, 0, 0.5))
  idx[is.na(idx)] <- 2
  ia_cols <- c(col_conn, col_unconn, col_unconn)[idx]
  plot(catIA_2009$geom, col = ia_cols, border = NA, lwd = lwd_minor, add = TRUE)
}

# Streams
plot(streams_v$geom, col = col_stream, lwd = lwd_stream, lty = lty_stream, add = TRUE)

# Catchment boundaries (keep your existing per-feature colours)
plot(catMap11_f$geom,
     lty = catch_lty, lwd = catch_lwd,
     border = sf::st_drop_geometry(catMap11_f)$col,
     add = TRUE)

# Sites (black outline)
plot(siteMap11_f$geom,
     pch = pch_site,
     bg  = siteMap11_f$col,
     col = col_site_border,
     lwd = pt_lwd_site,
     cex = cex_pts,
     add = TRUE)

# Site labels
if (inherits(siteLabels_f, "sf") && nrow(siteLabels_f) > 0) {
  siteLabels_f$font[siteLabels_f$font == 1] <- 2
  xy_lab <- sf::st_coordinates(siteLabels_f)
  halo_text(xy_lab[,1], xy_lab[,2], siteLabels_f$sites_p,
            cex = cex_site_lab, font = 2)
}

# Bring back the three arrows (LS/LM/LN)
if (inherits(siteLabels_f, "sf") && inherits(siteMap11_f, "sf") &&
    "siteLabel" %in% names(siteLabels_f) && "sitecode" %in% names(siteMap11_f)) {

  xyL <- sf::st_coordinates(siteLabels_f)
  xyS <- sf::st_coordinates(siteMap11_f)

  get_xy_label <- function(lbl) xyL[siteLabels_f$siteLabel == lbl, , drop = FALSE]
  get_xy_site  <- function(code) xyS[siteMap11_f$sitecode == code, , drop = FALSE]

  LS <- get_xy_label("LS"); LSS <- get_xy_site("LSS0001")
  LM <- get_xy_label("LM"); LIS <- get_xy_site("LIS0001")
  LN <- get_xy_label("LN"); LSN <- get_xy_site("LSN0001")

  if (nrow(LS) && nrow(LSS))
    arrows(LS[1,1] - 200, LS[1,2], LSS[1,1], LSS[1,2], length = 0.05, lwd = lwd_arrow)
  if (nrow(LM) && nrow(LIS))
    arrows(LM[1,1], LM[1,2] + 100, LIS[1,1], LIS[1,2], length = 0.05, lwd = lwd_arrow)
  if (nrow(LN) && nrow(LSN))
    arrows(LN[1,1], LN[1,2] - 100, LSN[1,1], LSN[1,2], length = 0.05, lwd = lwd_arrow)
}

# Scale bar
raster::scalebar(2000,
                 xy = c(xlim_pad[1] + 0.04 * diff(xlim_pad),
                        ylim_pad[1] + 0.07 * diff(ylim_pad)),
                 label = "2 km", cex = 1.05)

# Frame + axes
box(lwd = lwd_box)
axis(1, cex.axis = cex_axis)
axis(2, cex.axis = cex_axis)

mtext("Easting (m)",  side = 1, line = 3.4, font = 2, cex = cex_axis_title)
mtext("Northing (m)", side = 2, line = 5.2, font = 2, cex = cex_axis_title)

# ----------------------------
# 9) RIGHT COLUMN PANELS
# ----------------------------
par(mar = c(0.6, 0.6, 0.6, 0.6))
draw_inset_australia()

par(mar = c(0.6, 0.6, 0.6, 0.6))
draw_inset_victoria()

par(mar = c(0.6, 0.6, 0.6, 0.6))
draw_key_panel()
```
